Post.title: Vultr + shadowsocks
Post._content: xiangkantuoyiwuIP**server** servermoneyterminal ---- 1. Vultr 1.1 1.2 2. shadowsocks 2.1 2.2 3. shadowsocks 3.1 shadowsocks 3.2 3.3 BBR 4. 5. IP 5.1 5.2 ---- OK ## 1. Vultr IP Vultr$2.5IPdestroyserverserver > > - serverdestroyshut downVultr > - Vultr ### 1.1 [](https://www.vultr.com/?ref=7376052) > - 2018[1025,Twitter3](https://www.vultr.com/promo25b?service=promo25b)$2.5 > - paypal Vultr515/30/24=0.0069 **serverdestroy** Vultr 2.5/ 512M 20G SSD 100M 500G/ 5/ 1G 25G SSD 100M 1000G/ 10/ 2G 40G SSD 100M 2000G/ 20/...10B ### 1.2 1. Deploy now ![Deploy now]() 2. ![location](https://note.youdao.com/yws/public/resource/43b604e3f4af8e556ba74b9d257529c9/xmlnote/WEBRESOURCEfeaee86d537f4afe61290ff166121c8e/1568) [](https://www.vultr.com/faq/#downloadspeedtests) ping 60ms(90ms)****230ms$2.5**** 3. ![server type](https://note.youdao.com/yws/public/resource/43b604e3f4af8e556ba74b9d257529c9/xmlnote/WEBRESOURCE4b016d95365e775b8c2bd357cc9bed3e/1560) 64Ubuntu16.04 x64 > 4. Server size 5. Additional feature ![additional](https://note.youdao.com/yws/public/resource/43b604e3f4af8e556ba74b9d257529c9/xmlnote/WEBRESOURCE5fe9d2b28a523cd19a1c64baa17a8c5b/1551) Enable IPv6 Deploy nowSever ![goodnews](https://note.youdao.com/yws/public/resource/43b604e3f4af8e556ba74b9d257529c9/xmlnote/D5F285C71C1B4E7DBD29C621E4ED96C8/1582) Good newsTwitter3 IP ![account](https://note.youdao.com/yws/public/resource/43b604e3f4af8e556ba74b9d257529c9/xmlnote/WEBRESOURCEbb76680f71e379461bda08a950d9c129/1558) IP OK ## 2. shadowsocks ### 2.1 sshiMacssh > macOS itermwindowsxshell IP140.82.1.1, root1234 iterm ``` ssh root@140.82.1.1 ``` yes ![ssh](https://note.youdao.com/yws/public/resource/43b604e3f4af8e556ba74b9d257529c9/xmlnote/WEBRESOURCE493679e03f5ba69d28f7e17ec974d1ff/1572) ### 2.2 > - rootVultrrootroot sudo > - who am i ```shell # apt-get update # pip apt-get install python-pip # pip pip install --upgrade pip # setuptools pip install setuptools # shadowsocks pip install shadowsocks # vim /etc/shadowsocks.json ``` /etc/shadowsocks.json ```json { "server":"0.0.0.0", "server_port":1024, "local_address": "127.0.0.1", "local_port":1080, "password":"mypassword", "timeout":300, "method":"aes-256-cfb" } ``` passwordshadowsocks ```shell # shadowsocks chmod 755 /etc/shadowsocks.json # apt-get install python-m2crypto # shadowsocks ssserver -c /etc/shadowsocks.json -d start # shadowsocks vim /etc/rc.local ``` exit 0shadowsocks ```shell # In order to enable or disable this script just change the execution # bits. # # By default this script does nothing. ssserver -c /etc/shadowsocks.json -d start exit 0 ``` ## 3. shadowsocks ### 3.1 shadowsocks [shadowsocks](https://shadowsocks.org/en/download/clients.html)[](https://github.com/shadowsocks) shadowsocks > - Windowsshadowsocks-windows > - MacshadowsocksX-NG > - Linuxshadowsocks-qt5 > - Androidshadowsocks-android > - iOS/App StoreshadowsockwingyFirstWingy 2018.03.25Wingy & ShadowrocketPPShadowrocket ### 3.2 macOSAndroidiosmacOS 1. macOS ![macOS](https://note.youdao.com/yws/public/resource/43b604e3f4af8e556ba74b9d257529c9/xmlnote/WEBRESOURCE511ac2e3e0995d025a3ceae070083baf/1548) ![serverconfig](https://note.youdao.com/yws/public/resource/43b604e3f4af8e556ba74b9d257529c9/xmlnote/WEBRESOURCEf1db0c562f3786d55082e08c3f167f0e/1569) /etc/shadowsocks.json PAC > + PACshadowsocks > + shadowsocks **** ![youtube](https://note.youdao.com/yws/public/resource/43b604e3f4af8e556ba74b9d257529c9/xmlnote/C82A7973BDB54D1A89E8E951A0975128/1592) ![google](https://note.youdao.com/yws/public/resource/43b604e3f4af8e556ba74b9d257529c9/xmlnote/774B8B2BE1AD422A9F42DB22F8123ECC/1594) 2. Android 3. ios ### 3.3 BBR BBRGoogle4K Vultr ```shell # uname -a ``` 4.9root ```shell # getconf LONG_BIT # http://kernel.ubuntu.com/~kernel-ppa/mainline/ wget http://kernel.ubuntu.com/~kernel-ppa/mainline/v4.10.2/linux-image-4.10.2-041002-generic_4.10.2-041002.201703120131_amd64.deb # dpkg -i linux-image-4.10.2-041002-generic_4.10.2-041002.201703120131_amd64.deb # grub update-grub # reboot ``` 4.9BBR ```shell # echo "net.core.default_qdisc=fq" >> /etc/sysctl.conf echo "net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control=bbr" >> /etc/sysctl.conf # sudo bash -c 'echo "net.core.default_qdisc=fq" >> /etc/sysctl.conf' sudo bash -c 'echo "net.ipv4.tcp_congestion_control=bbr" >> /etc/sysctl.conf' # sysctl -p # sysctl net.ipv4.tcp_available_congestion_control # et.ipv4.tcp_available_congestion_control = bbr cubic reno ``` ![BBR](https://note.youdao.com/yws/public/resource/43b604e3f4af8e556ba74b9d257529c9/xmlnote/WEBRESOURCE45c12c020d1250bc6987a574bfc002d9/1559) ## 4. > 88 ![wait](https://note.youdao.com/yws/public/resource/43b604e3f4af8e556ba74b9d257529c9/xmlnote/WEBRESOURCE43797ec7852cedd58b8828750b25f0a8/1563) > /etc/shadowsocks.json ```json { "server": "0.0.0.0", "port_password": { "8381": "NvShenDeMiMa", "8382": "WoDeMiMa", }, "local_address": "127.0.0.1", "local_port":1080, "timeout": 300, "method": "aes-256-cfb" } ``` ```shell ssserver -c /etc/shadowsocks.json -d stop ssserver -c /etc/shadowsocks.json -d start ``` shadowsocks ## 5. IP IP Vultr ### 5.1 [Vultr](https://my.vultr.com/)"Servers""Snapshot" ![snapshot](https://note.youdao.com/yws/public/resource/43b604e3f4af8e556ba74b9d257529c9/xmlnote/7E630896F280441F981459B4E07D6B83/1584) ### 5.2 Destroy ![Destroy](https://note.youdao.com/yws/public/resource/43b604e3f4af8e556ba74b9d257529c9/xmlnote/WEBRESOURCEf9ca21674a9f6afbfa92d1fed57eaf67/1570) "server type""Snapshot" ![renew](https://note.youdao.com/yws/public/resource/43b604e3f4af8e556ba74b9d257529c9/xmlnote/WEBRESOURCE52c886684b9142d706b256f4e72679c0/1554) shadowsocksIPIP --- --- **** ***Author:*** Leoch ***Blog:*** [leoch.xyz](http://leoch.xyz) ***Inspired by:*** [flyzy](https://www.flyzy2005.com) plz refer to it for more information. ---
